verbs.description: [ARG1: heat advisory] [V: issued] [ARG2: for chicago area] [ARGM-TMP: as heat indices up to 109 expected] a heat advisory for the chicago area will be in effect from 11 a m to 7 p m monday according to the national weather service national weather service national oceanic and atmospheric administration chicago
